Thanx. I did searches for "Menasor", "Prowl", "IR", and "Rdahl", but 
couldn't find that post. And I think Megan has control of IR back, so 
I'll only post with Prowl.

::Prowl::

Prowl holds onto Menasor's back as the gestalt rights himself, 
digging his talons further into Menasor as the bot starts spinning. 
Bringing his head up, Prowl lunges it down at Menasor's neck, biting 
the bot as hard as he could.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Sure why not. This is after you started stabbing my back.
> 
> BIC:
> Menasor felt the stabbing pain in his back, the metal there began to
> shread, but he had a lot of fight left in him. He put his powerful 
arms to
> the ground, and pushed, righting himself, then, with no logic or 
thought,
> just pure instinct, spun himself, flailing his arms, to rid himself 
of his
> attackers. He then noticed Firearm and remembered Astroblast's 
objective,
> he reached for the hurt robot again.
